artifact_purpose: Provide a fast, structured summary of a production alert to guide mitigation and resolution.
format_hint: Bullet-point summary with linked logs and suggested actions; use a neutral, technical tone.

inputs.context: Correlated log lines near the alert window
Ownership and contact for affected service

workflow_steps: Detect critical alert and extract metadata
Correlate logs from the same time window
validation_criteria: Includes root alert title and timestamp
Links to logs and dashboards are present
Suggested actions are relevant and actionable
Reviewed by on-call engineer before escalation
feedback_mechanism: Slack emoji reactions and manual edits feed improvement loop
